[Recon has to be near someone to talk. execpt if he is using a com. 
you neve posted him using a com so that is how we know where he is. 
anyways Angel Prime uses heat sensors. everything produces a certain 
tempature. if you go below the tempature of the place he dectects 
that. so if you are hotter or colder then the tempature of the place 
he can detect it.]


Angel Prime



He dextended his blades and pulled out his energon shot gun. [the 
inside the shell is pure energon.]  He shot two shots at Terrorbot.
